author: amaltaro
body:
I don't think this Overview service was ever put in production and, latest (and only) change to the dmwm/overview repository date back to 2012, so we better stop building its RPMs as well.
The cleaner we can get cmsdist/COMP, the easier it is to move forward with services that are still very much relevant to CMS.
title: Remove spec file for Overview and xRegexp
